item.title: Osiris
item.content: Osiris was a primeval king of Egypt, the very first to civilize the people. He taught them agriculture and animal husbandry, gave them a code of laws to live by and showed them the proper ways to worship the gods. Egypt became a mighty land under his kind and gentle rule. Eventually, in the twenty-eighth year of his reign, Osiris was murdered by Seth, who wanted the throne for himself.
